ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would absolutely recommend it to everyone who is planning to teach language (or literature) in the future. I feel privileged that our department offers this semester-long course as there is no way that we would have gained the experience and background knowledge that we have now in a week long intensive course (as they do in other language departments) or other quick-training formats.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: In preparing a lesson for a practicum, I actually stumbled across a topic that I feel passionate about and am hoping to develop further in my dissertation research next year.
